data.name: Ame no Marginal -Rain Marginal- - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Steam edition of the soundtrack used in the game.

  • 01 - Ame no Marginal
  • 02 - Ame - Untitled1
  • 03 - Nomikomu Uso (from narcissu2)
  • 04 - Minami-muki no Mado (from narcissu2)
  • 05 - Yozora 87's (from Ramune)
  • 06 - Fades (from Scarlett)
  • 07 - Silver Coupe (from narcissu)
  • 08 - Kanashiki Shirabe (from narcissu3)
  • 09 - Sabishiki Senritsu (from narcissu3)
  • 10 - Ramune 79s ver.2 (from narcissu)
  • 11 - Shumatsu no Sugoshikata Yori - orgel (from narcissu)
  • 12 - Rainy Weather (from Scarlett)
  • 13 - Hoshizora 79's (from Ramune)
  • 14 - Shimu Sora (from Aka)
  • 15 - Kenzoku (from Aka)
  • 16 - Shizumu Sora (from Aka)
  • 17 - 7F (from narcissu)
  • 18 - Ame - Untitled2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win XP+
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or better, 2GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
